description: I2C Flow Totalizer Component. A specific instance of a chip that integates pulse count flow meters and reports the result as I2C.

ComponentId.title: Component Id
ComponentId.description: Primary GridWorks identifier for a specific physical instance of a PipeFlowSensor, and also as a more generic Component.

ComponentAttributeClassId.title: Unique identifier for ComponentAttributeClass object articulated by the component.attribute.class.gt.001 type.
ComponentAttributeClassId.description: Unique identifier for the device class. Authority for these, as well as the relationship between Components and ComponentAttributeClasses (Cacs) is maintained by the World Registry.

I2cAddress.description: The I2cAddress that this component can be found at on the I2cBus.

ConfigList.description: A list of the ChannelConfigs for the data channels reported by this actor.

PulseFlowMeterMakeModel.title: Pulse Flow Meter MakeModel
PulseFlowMeterMakeModel.description: The MakeModel of the pulse flow meter that this I2cFlowTotalizer is attached to.

ConversionFactor.description: The factor that the cumulative output must be multiplied by in order to read gallons.

UuidCanonicalTextual.description: A string of hex words separated by hyphens of length 8-4-4-4-12.
